tldr: All versions of this package are vulnerable to CVE-2024-4367 due to the use of a vulnerable version of `pdf.js`, which permits arbitrary JavaScript execution through Cross-site Scripting (xss).
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you use this package.
how_to_fix: Since no fix is available for this package, you can mitigate the vulnerability by forking the library and setting the `isEvalSupported` property in the `pdf.js` configuration to `false`. Alternatively, you can use `pdf.js` directly by leveraging the https://www.npmjs.com/package/pdfjs-dist package.
